meanings.definition: To cook sugar or food until it becomes caramel in flavor and color.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys caramelizing apples for a tasty dessert.
meanings.sent2: The chef is caramelizing the onions for the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amazed by the magic of caramelizing sugar into a delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun was caramelizing the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of caramelizing sugar filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.definition: To make something brown and sweet by heating it.
meanings.sent1: The baker is caramelizing the top of the crème brûlée.
meanings.sent2: The heat is caramelizing the sugar on the roasted carrots.
meanings.sent3: The campfire was caramelizing the marshmallows to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The sun was caramelizing the skin of the beachgoers.
meanings.sent5: The torch was caramelizing the sugar on the crème brûlée with precision.
